2.0.name: wordpress/wp-gmaps2
2.0.description: This plugin allows the integration of Google Maps on your pages or posts using the Wordpress Editor (TinyMCE). It supports multiple maps on the same post/page and within each map you can set many options, like the position of the marker, controls, icon of the marker, InfoWindow with Tabs with HTML support, etc. Give it a try.
